altername_name: ビヨンド ザ ビヨンド
name: Beyond the Beyond
overview: Beyond the Beyond gather warriors mages pirates and mystics ,, observe as they transform into more powerful class .. clerks evolve into high clerks monks into master monks and conjurers into mighty summers. unravel complex secrets in two rishly textured views .. explore in lush top-down isometric view and battle savage enemies in full 360 .frow stronger and smarter with each victory your swordmanship increses in power and your magic will swell with potent energy . use supreme magic to summon monsters and fatal storms hurl tormentors into another dimension . drown them in a boiling sea of fire.
